bug.author: jiafatom
bug.summary: DataTypeBase init error caused by a bug in PR 563
bug.description:
I made a comment to PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/coremltools/pull/563>563</denchmark-link> , it will cause DataTypeBase init error, which breaks our onnxmltools <denchmark-link:https://dev.azure.com/onnxmltools/onnxmltools/_build/results?buildId=8949&view=logs&j=03329c05-1f9f-5d37-62ae-822c2e7179c1&t=be5df694-97a2-5719-346c-7b12aef699b8>pipeline</denchmark-link>
The detail is: should not be in : should change to

comments.comment: Fix has been merged. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jiafatom>@jiafatom</denchmark-link> Let us know its still creating issue for onnxmltools pipeline. Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jiafatom>@jiafatom</denchmark-link> !
